items.name: 6 Pack / Glue
items.desc:
Glue 6.5% is a juicy IPA in our house style with Citra, Motueka and Nelson!
This beer is Vegan friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders over £60.
Please note that orders are shipped using an express service once you have received an email stating that your order is completed! Couriers are still experiencing unprecedented demand and it may take longer than normal to receive your order. We appreciate your patience. Shipping to UK mainland only.

items.name: 6 Pack / Minds Eye
items.desc:
Mind’s Eye is a new 4.8% Pale Ale. Soft, juicy with rye malt in the grist and Riwaka and Mosaic on the dry hop.
This beer is Vegan friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders over £60.
Please note that orders are shipped using an express service once you have received an email stating that your order is completed! Couriers are still experiencing unprecedented demand and it may take longer than normal to receive your order. We appreciate your patience. Shipping to UK mainland only.

items.name: 6 Pack / Steady Rolling Man
items.desc:
Steady Rolling Man 5.2%. Our pale ale. Inspired by the ridiculously tasty, hoppy beers we fell for, we got brewing our own versions, over and over again, whilst listening to the blues greats. The heady concoction of old time blues records and juicy American hops transfixed us from the start and the steady rolling man was born in these sessions! Incredibly soft and delicate with intense tropical fruit hop aromatics and saturation, this is our vision of the perfect pale ale.
This beer is Vegan friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders over £60.
Please note that orders are shipped using an express service from when you receive an email stating that your order is now completed! Couriers are still experiencing unprecedented demand and it may take longer than normal to receive your order. We appreciate your patience. Shipping to UK mainland only.

items.name: 6 Pack/ I Am Locked Away In A High-Tech Wraparound, Translucent, Blue Tinted Fortress
items.desc:
I Am Locked Away In A High-Tech Wraparound Translucent, Blue Tinted Fortress 6% is a Passionfruit sour IPA with Citra and El Dorado hops. Tart, bright passionfruit and delicious fresh hops – an absolute belter!
This beer is Vegan Friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders £60 and over!

Couriers are still experiencing some delays so it may take a little while longer for your order to reach you. We appreciate your patience. Shipping to mainland UK only.

items.name: 6 Pack/Go Back For More Tokens
items.desc:
Go Back For More Tokens 6.2% IPA
Indy Man Beer Con collab – A citrus IPA with lemon zest, orange zest and yuzu juice! Hopped with Centennial, Citra, Enigma and Idaho 7 this IPA is a citrus, heady delight!

items.name: 6 Pack/Something Good 9
items.desc:
Something Good 9 IPA 6.2%
For the ninth iteration of our Something Good series we explore a heritage malt as the base for this beer. The Chevalier malt provides a rich, biscuity backbone with Simcoe Cryo and Ekuanot Cryo hops bringing a tropical, citrus and pine goodness. Something Good 9 is a rich, fruit forward, soft IPA.
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders £60 and over!
Please note that orders are shipped using an express service from when you receive an email stating that your order is now completed. Couriers are still experiencing some delays so it may take a little while longer for your order to reach you. We appreciate your patience. Shipping to mainland UK only.

items.desc:

items.name: Cast Aspersions
items.desc:
Cast Aspersions 6.5% is a brand new IPA – soft, juicy and dry hopped with Azacca, Bru-1, Citra Cryo and Equanot Cryo. Expect sweet pineapple vibes!
This beer is Vegan friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders £60 and over!

items.name: Something Good 8
items.desc:
Something Good 8 6.2% is the 8th iteration of our Something Good series. For this beer we have switched up the soft, juicy profile of our usual IPA’s for a lean and clean experience!
Something Good 8 has flaked rice in the grist, uses a West Coast ale yeast and is dry hopped with Chinook, Simcoe and Enigma. You can expect plenty of citrus and pine flavour!
This beer is Vegan friendly!
Packs sold in 6x500ml cans. Shipping £5.99 per box. Free shipping on orders £60 and over!
Please note that orders are shipped at next day delivery from when the order has been completed not processed! Shipping to UK mainland only.
